item.title: Privacy Policy - Game Factory One
item.description: Read the privacy policy for Game Factory One here. We make fun-to play games. Come have a look!

item.title: Feudoku
item.description: A fun and tactical turn based sudoku app you can play with your friends! Available on Android, and coming to iOS.

item.title: Privacy Policy - Feudoku
item.description: Read the privacy policy for Feudoku here. Feudoku is a fun and tactical turn based sudoku app you can play with your friends!
